ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Help! My voice has been nerfed!
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh man that s rough. I hope you ve e-mailed Verant right away. That way they can try to patch ASAP (or am I being hopelessly optimistic) If there s anything I
ygData.messageBody:
Oh man that's rough. I hope you've e-mailed Verant right away. That way they
can try to patch ASAP (or am I being hopelessly optimistic)
If there's anything I can do (as a two finger QWERTY typer) just holler...


Gates
----- Original Message -----
From: "Todd Morris" <GaybirderSF@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 12:19 PM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Help! My voice has been nerfed!


> Well, more fun with yesterday's patch. I type in Dvorak (a
> different keyboard layout), which EQ has not supported. Throws me
> from 90 wpm in Dvorak to about 30 in qwerty. So, last month a patch
> on the test server had a message that Verant was looking to modify EQ
> to support various keyboard layouts -- hurray! I followed the
> instructions to modify a text file & email it back to the guy in
> charge of that fix so that he would know what keys went where in the
> layout I use. I also told him when I did so that the modified text
> file to enable Dvorak caused a problem -- a few keys (most
> importantly the slash key) didn't work.
>
> Well, yesterday's patch included the new file -- with the bug still
> in it. This means I cannot /g, /gu, /r, /t, /shout, or /anything at
> all. Aargh! Switching my computer back to qwerty doesn't change this,
> as EQ sets its keyboard layout from its own files.
>
> So, until this is fixed, I'm stuck switching chat channels in the
> chat box. Expect me to be in /gu as the default (I think that's one
> of the options in there -- surely hope so!), so I won't be able to
> /say, /t, or /r anything without a bit of a delay to switch it around
> in the chat box.
>
> Hmmm. How do I use sign-language ingame?
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Shoes? On the web?
> Click Here!
> http://click.egroups.com/1/7061/9/_/560749/_/964109983/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>
>
